survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee perceptions of workplace air quality and its impact on productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Describe any specific symptoms you experience due to poor air quality (e.g., headaches, respiratory issues).
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Describe any specific symptoms you experience due to poor air quality (e.g., headaches, respiratory issues).
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.

questions.question_text: How does air quality affect your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale. Randomize positive/negative options.

script.question_text: How does air quality affect your productivity at work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following improvements would most enhance workplace air quality? (Select up to 2)
questions.client_notes: Allow limited multi-selection. Include 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with max 2 selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following improvements would most enhance workplace air quality? (Select up to 2)

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q6.
questions.client_notes: Optional open-ended for additional suggestions. Limit to 200 characters.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q6.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of the company's current air quality policies or initiatives?

script.question_text: How aware are you of the company's current air quality policies or initiatives?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in receiving more information about improving workplace air quality?

script.question_text: Would you be interested in receiving more information about improving workplace air quality?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding workplace air quality?
questions.client_notes: Optional open-ended for final feedback. Limit to 1000 characters.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or suggestions regarding workplace air quality?
